name: Terra Curiositatis
description:
"Terra Curiostasi...Terra Curiosatia...Terra whatever" - PC Gamer

Terra Curiositatis is a screensaver originally created for #screensaverjam.

Featuring approximately 1.5 hours of unique content, Terra Curiositatis fulfills all your screensaver-related needs.

Featured in PC Gamer's top 5 free games of the week section!

Terra Curiositatis displays every significant stage involved in the excavation of treasure ,including:

-Scouting for the treasure

-Digging out the treasure

-Exfiltrating and securing the treasure

Version History

Current Version: 1.3

-Added Backgrounds

Version 1.2:

-New visual effects to support perception

-Stability improvements

Version 1.1:

-New feature: Colour-palettes.

-You can now download colourlovers.com palettes and apply them to the simulation to drasticly modify the mood.

-You can also save and load your favourite palletes!

-Improved menu navigation

-minor improvements to the workers' ai
